hint.description: The text to display inside the text input when it's empty, and above the text input when it's not.

onlyNumbers.description: Whether the input should only accept numbers.

optional.description: The name of a toggleButton widget. If not empty, the the textInput will only be shown when the toggleButton is on.

invertOptional.description: Inverts the behavior of optional. If true, the textInput will only be shown when the toggleButton is off.

title.description: The title to display above the bar.

subtitle.description: The subtitle to display below the bar.

min.description: The minimum value of the bar (inclusive).

max.description: The maximum value of the bar (inclusive).

step.description:
The step size of the bar.
The final number of steps in the bar will be ('max' - 'min' + 1) / 'step'.

score.description:
The scores to give for each step.
Must be the same length as the final number of steps (('max' - 'min' + 1) / 'step').

title.description: The title to display besides the game number selector.

includeFinals.description: Whether finals should be included in the game number selection.

includePractice.description: Whether practice should be included in the game number selection.

title.description: The title to display besides the button.

score.description:
The score to give to the team if this button is toggled.
If inverted is true, grants the points if this button is not toggled.

inverted.description: If true, grants the score if this button is not toggled.

title.description: The title to display above the logo.
The title to display above the image.

image.description:
The path of the image to display.
Starts from the project's root.

title.description: The title to display besides the counter.

min.description: The minimum value of the counter.

max.description:
The maximum value of the counter.
Must be greater than 'min' + 'step'.

step.description:
The step size of the counter.
Must be greater than 0.
If the step is not a floating point number, the min and max will be rounded to the nearest integer.

initial.description: The initial value of the counter.

score.description:
The number of points a single step will give to the team.
For example, if the 'score' field is 2, and the counter's value is 10, then the final score will be 20.

title.description: The title to display above the notes input box.
The title to display above the timer.

score.description: The number of points a single second will give to the team (this number will be multiplied by the time).

title.description: The title to display above the text in the normal text style.

text.description: The text to display in the special style.

color.description: The color of the text in hexadecimal.
